name: Freelance Dashboard
description: Supercharge your business with this all-in-one system to manage your clients, projects, finances and more.Turns Notion into the only tool you need to manage your entire business in one place.⏳ Set-up in 5 minutes Designed to help you:→ Manage your entire business in one place, rather than scattered over several apps.→ Create a seamless process that will impress the hell out of your clients→ Cut hours from your day and make all the admin work that comes with running a business effortless.Tour The
features: Client Management; Project Management; Task Management; Meeting Notes; Client Portal; Invoice Tracker; Finance Tracker; Testimonials; Email Templates; Resource Management
